cleaned_text: Having the most [comprehensive pain management Utah](https://www.ardurecoverycenter.com/utah-rehab-programs/comprehensive-pain-management-utah/) residents can find is an important part of our mission. As such, Ardu has partnered with Dr. James Reichman, PT, DPT to bring an innovative approach to chronic pain management to our clients. Dr. Reichman specializes in spine rehabilitation with an emphasis on manual therapy and manipulation for both the spine and extremities. Dr. Reichman is certified in Dry Needling (Acupuncture), Graston Augmented Soft Tissue Mobilization and Chinese Cupping Therapy. As the best [inpatient chronic pain treatment center,](https://www.ardurecoverycenter.com/utah-rehab-programs/inpatient-chronic-pain-treatment-center-utah/) Utah has to offer, we will offer all of these alternative medicine therapies to Ardu clients in-house. To learn more about the alternative medicine modalities offered at Ardu Recovery, call us today at [801-810-1234](tel:801-810-1234).
